sait.frms.manager

Class ReservationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.frms.manager.ReservationManager

  • public class ReservationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ReservationManager - a class that will generate a reservation code for the user. ALso, we make and find a reservation by searching the code of the reservation. Also, save all reservation objects to a binary file on the hard drive.
    Version:
    ( March 27th, 2021 )
    Author:
    ( Prince Bansal, Akshat Sawraj, Nagi Nabal )

      ReservationManager()
      ReservtionManager - a default constructor for this class will call the populateFromBinary method.

        the available seat.

      • generateReservationCode

        private java.lang.String generateReservationCode(sait.frms.problemdomain.Flight flight)
        generateReservationCoe - a method that will receive a parameter called flight and generate a reservation code based on format: (L meaning letter, D meaning Digit) l.e.: LDDDD. The letter either will be "D" for Domestic or "I" for international and return the generation code.
        Parameters:
        flight - - this will hold a flight object
        Returns:
        the generation number for the flight.

      • makeReservation

        public sait.frms.problemdomain.Reservation makeReservation(sait.frms.problemdomain.Flight flight,
                                                           java.lang.String name,
                                                           java.lang.String citizenship)
        makeReservatin - a method that receive three parameters to make the reservation.
        Parameters:
        flight - - this will hold a flight object
        name - - this will hold name of the traveller
        citizenship - - this will hold the citizenship of the traveller
        Returns:
        the new reservation when it made it.

      • findReservations

        public java.util.ArrayList<sait.frms.problemdomain.Reservation> findReservations(java.lang.String code,
                                                                                 java.lang.String airline,
                                                                                 java.lang.String name)
        findReservation - a method that will find an existing reservation flight and return the result to the user.
        Parameters:
        code - - this will hold reservation code
        airline - - this will hold the airline name for trip booked
        name - - this will hold the name of the customer
        Returns:
        the reservation flight that found.

        public sait.frms.problemdomain.Reservation findReservationByCode(java.lang.String code)
        findReservationByCode - a method that receive one parameter called code to search for a reservation flight by code.
        Parameters:
        code - - this will hold the reservation code
        Returns:
        the reservation by the code.
